alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 9:06PM CDT until May 04 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GRAYSON COUNTY... At 905 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitesboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sherman, Whitesboro, Denison, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Gunter, Knollwood, Dorchester, Eisenhower State Park, Randell Lake, Lake Texoma, Southmayd, Tioga, Sadler, Dixie, Ethel, Locust, Gordonville, Sandusky and Lake Ray Roberts. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
